summary: Completed comprehensive testing of The Booker SaaS multi-tenant appointment scheduling platform. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success), frontend UI excellent with modern design and language toggle, but critical booking flow progression issue prevents users from completing appointments.

integration_issues.issue: Service selection does not progress to provider selection step
integration_issues.details: After clicking a service card, the booking wizard remains on step 1 (service selection) instead of progressing to step 2 (provider selection). Admin panel shows provider exists and is associated with service, but booking flow filtering logic may be failing.

passed_tests: Frontend loads with beautiful modern glassmorphism design
Language toggle (EN/PT) works perfectly in both booking and admin pages
All text switches correctly between English and Portuguese
Admin dashboard loads with proper 3-column layout (Tenants/Services/Providers)
Admin can select tenant and see associated services and providers
Service cards display correctly with prices and duration
Step indicators (1,2,3,4) render properly in booking wizard
Manrope font applied correctly to headings
Violet accent color theme implemented throughout
Navigation between booking and admin pages works
Tenant management in admin panel functional
Service management in admin panel functional
Provider management in admin panel functional
Language toggle works in admin dashboard
Modern card-based UI with proper hover effects
All data-testid attributes present for testing

success_percentage.frontend: 85% (UI excellent, language toggle perfect, but booking flow broken)
success_percentage.integration: 20% (Admin integration works, booking flow fails at step progression)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix booking flow step progression from service selection to provider selection. The issue appears to be in the frontend logic that filters providers by selected service. Admin panel shows provider 'John Smith' is associated with service 'Haircut', but booking wizard doesn't progress to provider selection step after service is clicked. Check provider filtering logic in BookingPage.js around line 86-88 (availableProviders filter) and ensure service-provider associations are working correctly.
